          <title>
            <string language="en">Transmission of plasmid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Übertragung des Plasmids</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Transmission de plasmide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Transmissão do plasmid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Trasmissione del plasmide</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μετάδοση του πλασμιδίου</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Transmisión del plasmid</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the transmission of plasmid through vertical transmission (left) and horizontal transmission (right).</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bacteria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">cell division</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">conjugation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">horizontal transmission</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="en">plasmid</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">replication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vertical transmission</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt die Übertragung des 
Plasmids durch vertikale Übertragung (nach links) und die horizontale
Übertragung (recht).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre la transmission du 
plasmide par la transmission verticale (à gauche) et la transmission 
horizontale (droite).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra a transmissão do plasmid
através da transmissão vertical (à esquerda) e da transmissão 
horizontal (direita).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra la trasmissione del 
plasmide attraverso la trasmissione verticale (a sinistra) e la 
trasmissione orizzontale (di destra).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει τη μετάδοση του 
πλασμιδίου μέσω της κάθετης μετάδοσης (αριστερά) και οριζόντια 
μετάδοση (δεξιά).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra la transmisión del 
plasmid a través de la transmisión vertical (a la izquierda) y de la
transmisión horizontal (derecha).</string>
          </description>
